channel.title: Monster energy shield and possible armour set
channel.description:
i'm currently working on a monster energy shield i may relese or maybe not just depends on the comments i get but here are some pics
first screenie
[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/qs1f5s.jpg[/img]
second screenie
[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/294qnbd.jpg[/img]
third screenie
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/15psaqq.jpg[/img]
fourth screenie
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/2js8r4.jpg[/img]
fifth screenie
[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/bhc2uw.jpg[/img]
sixth screenie
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/262b51v.jpg[/img]
i'll keep adding pics as i progress
credits 50% me for putting it all together and making the monster symbol 25% monster for there symbol pic 25% to whoever made the shield

item.title: Monster energy shield and possible armour set
item.dc:creator: @Buddy_budster Buddy_budster
item.description:
@Buddy_budster wrote:

demonnd:

assassinated

Was there really a reason for posting this. I think not! :d please dont post like this unless its constructive.

although i do agree with ACF try to do more other than trace and put your trace on another model although it turned out good it cna make you lack creativity.

Try something else i hope to see more from you in tyhe future

Read full topic
